Package org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.database

Class DatabaseUtils

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.lib.database.DatabaseUtils
public class DatabaseUtils extends Object
This class bundles static utilities to be called on Database and objects contained in Databases.

    • updateDb

      public static void updateDb(@Nonnull File file)
      Updates the database from the given File object to the latest scheme.
      Parameters:
      file - database file
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if an SQLException or IOException were caught

    • detectGraphs

      public static ArrayList<Set<Node>> detectGraphs(Collection<Node> nodes)
      This detects all graphs that exist in the database and returns them as lists of nodes.
      Parameters:
      nodes - the collection of Nodes that graphs should be detected in
      Returns:
      Lists of graph nodes.

    • searchGraph

      public static Set<Node> searchGraph(Node startNode)
      This searches all nodes of a graph by breadth-first search.
      Parameters:
      startNode - Start node for searching.

    • getDuplicateConnection

      public static Connection getDuplicateConnection(Database.Builder databaseBuilder, Connection connection)
      This checks if there already is a similar connection to the given one in the database without it being the same Connection. This will always return false if one of the nodes to check against or the found duplicate connection was not referenced in the database! The check goes down to the edge level and checks all nodes.
      Parameters:
      connection - Connection to check whether there is a duplicate in the database.
      Returns:
      connection which was duplicated by the given one or null

    • isIntersection

      public static boolean isIntersection(Node node)
      Determines, if a node is a intersection node, that is, it has more than 2 outgoing or incoming streets.
      Parameters:
      node - the node to check
      Returns:
      true if the node is an intersection

    • generateRestrictions

      public static void generateRestrictions(Database.Builder databaseBuilder)
      This processes all connections already read and tries to extract possible turn restrictions on junctions. For this the outgoing connections of the Connection are checked against the outgoing connections of the junction Node.

    • getNodeByIndex

      public static Node getNodeByIndex(Connection connection, int index)
      Return the node of a connection by the given index. If the index is negative, the node is chosen starting from the target of the connection. Examples: 0 returns the first node, -1 returns the last node. If the given index is outside the possible range of nodes, it returns the first or last node of the connection.
      Parameters:
      connection - the connection
      index - the index (negative
